snippet.title: Big Ben concussed after crunching tackle
snippet.content:
Ben Brown has left the field on a stretcher
NORTH Melbourne forward Ben Brown has left the field on a stretcher with concussion after being on the end of a crunching tackle from Collingwood's Brodie Grundy.
Grundy's second-quarter tackle was rewarded by the umpire as holding the ball before play was held up as Brown left the field on the motorised stretcher.
More to come
Ben Brown is being taken off on the stretcher following this tackle from Brodie Grundy.
